site.title: OSO Strength & Performance | Personal Training & Athletic Development
site.description: Strength training, performance coaching, and sustainable habits for busy adults and athletes.

props.headline: Train with purpose. Perform with confidence.
props.subheadline: OSO Strength & Performance helps you build real strength, move better, and stay consistent—with coaching that fits your life.

items.title: 1:1 Coaching
items.description: Individualized strength training with technique-first progressions.

items.title: Small Group Training
items.description: High energy sessions that keep you accountable and consistent.

items.title: Performance & Athletic Development
items.description: Speed, power, and mobility work that transfers to your sport.

props.headline: Coaching that meets you where you are
props.content: Every plan starts with an assessment and a clear path forward. We focus on fundamentals—strength, mobility, and conditioning—then build intensity as you earn it. No gimmicks. Just smart training and steady progress.
props.image: /images/oso/OSO Strength+Performance  text logo in dark gray and purple (1).jpg

items.quote: I finally feel strong and athletic again. The coaching is supportive and structured.
items.author: Taylor M.

items.quote: My lifts went up and my nagging knee pain improved because we fixed my movement.
items.author: Jordan K.

items.question: Do I need training experience to start?
items.answer: No. We start at your current level and build from there with clear progressions.

items.question: How often should I train?
items.answer: Most clients do best with 2–3 sessions per week plus a simple plan between sessions.

items.question: Can you help with mobility or old injuries?
items.answer: Yes. We’ll tailor exercises to your history and prioritize safe technique and range of motion.

props.headline: Ready to get started?
props.subheadline: Book a free assessment and leave with a clear plan for your next 12 weeks.
